contentList.content: Bolster your allies against the dangers that lie ahead.

Hit point maximum increased by [1].

When you roll a 1 on an Attack Roll, Ability Check, or Saving Throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

You can see in the dark up to [2].
Drinking this elixir grants the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="TutorialSupplies_Bolster">Bolster</LSTag> spell.
This crudely hammered bronze band is surprisingly heavy, resonating with a faint, earthy tremor that grants the wearer the raw, unrefined might of a hill giant.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> increases to [1], and your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> to [2].
Your melee weapon and unarmed attacks deal an additional [1].
